summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 12.0°C) and outside temperature (down 11.8°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 12%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 11713 lux) and cloud levels (up 373 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 16001 lux), the amount of wind (up 21 miles), cloud levels (up 258 m), and outside humidity (down 7%) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; cold spells are likely. Also, the atmosphere will feel parched and dry and winds should remain light. Showers, fog or low cloud is expected, and overcast conditions will limit sunlight. Little change in the weather.
